Title: â†©ï¸ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªâš¡ï¸- Official statement from the Yemeni Armed Forces / ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªâš¡ï¸- Yemeni Armed Forces statement to come in one hour. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªâš¡ï¸- Official statement from the Yemeni Armed Forces / Ansarullah military:-The American enemy launched a blatant aggression against our country in the past hours with more than 47 airstrikes, targeting several areas in the governorates of Sana'a, Sa'dah, Al Bayda, Hajjah, Dhamar, Ma'rib, and Al Jawf, in which the American enemy committed a number of massacres, resulting in the martyrdom and injury of dozens, in a preliminary toll.In response to this aggression, the Armed Forces of Yemen carried out a specific military operation targeting the American aircraft carrier USS Harry S. Truman and its warships in the northern Red Sea with 18 ballistic missiles and cruise missiles and a drone. This operation was jointly carried out by the missile force, the UAV force, and the naval forces.The Yemeni Armed Forces will not hesitate to target all American warships in the Red Sea and the Arabian Sea in retaliation to the aggression against our country. With the help of God Almighty, the Yemeni Armed Forces will continue to impose a naval blockade on the Israeli enemy and ban its ships in the declared zone of operations until aid and basic needs are delivered to Gaza.The American aggression will only increase the steadfastness, faith, and resilience of beloved Yemen and its steadfast, faithful, and struggling people.-

Title: â†©ï¸ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±âš¡- Alawite leaders' letter to the government of Israel...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±âš¡- -Syrian Alawite leaders have sent a joint urgent letter to the Prime Minister and Defense Minister of Israel requesting protection from the Syrian government,- - Guy Azriel, journalist for i24. ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±âš¡- Alawite leaders' letter to the government of Israel:-We, the Alawite clerics, issue the following statement after our meeting in one of the coastal villages:After the fall of the Assad regime and the assumption of power in Syria by an extremist Islamic group that adopts killing, kidnapping, displacement, and intimidation as a method and way to rule and dominate, and after the massacres and violations that occurred in the Alawite areas against their people in Tartus, Latakia, Homs, Hama, and the crimes of ethnic genocide, the State of Israel spoke the truth and echoed the truth and condemned these criminal acts.We declare our demand from the government of Israel, represented by its Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, to provide protection, assistance, aid and support, because the entire world has been silent about our injustice, and we have only heard a voice from the State of Israel condemning the crimes committed by the Damascus government against the Alawites, and for that we thank it.We say to the Jewish state, we extend our hands to you and we will be your best and most loyal friends, so that you can rid us of this extremist Islamic rule that will be a place for training and preparing groups from which they will launch their fight against you. In the past, you have suffered from the Islamists and known their crimes, and the treacherous terrorists of Islamic terrorism are the best example of the Hamas movement and terrorism as an example of terrorism and terror. And the Hamas movement is establishing a base in Syria that will be a launching point for action against you.Let us unite against the Islamic tide led by Turkey. My sons of David, your origin is gold, if you reach the Syrian coast, you will be welcomed with songs and flowers. May God bless the honorable State of Israel, its great leaders and its free and honorable people.We would like to thank Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Saâ€™ar for his words about the Alawites.-

Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦âš¡- Trump's team hold secret talks with Zelenskyâ€™s Ukrainian opposition. The talks were held with Yulia Tymoshenko, a Ukrainian political veteran, and Petro Poroshenko, former Ukrainian President. ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ - Ukrainian outlet, Kiev Independent, confirms Trump's team held secret talks with Ukrainian opposition figures on holding elections, in a bid to remove Zelensky from power.The talks were held with former Prime Minister, Yulia Tymoshenko, a veteran of Ukrainian politics. Tymoshenko belongs to the Batkivshchyna, a far-right conservative party. The party is far more anti-Russia than Zelensky's Servant of the Peoples Party.Trump's team also spoke with Poroshenko, the former President of Ukraine, and post-Maidan President. Poroshenko's popularity in Ukraine plummeted after the 'Roshen Chocolate Company' scandal. Poroshenko's government was believed to have been influenced by Ukraine's far-right sectors, which was evident by several appointments he had made. Such as Azov-linked Avakov as Interior Minister, and Troyan as Kiev's Chief of Police (a former Azov Commander). Both figures are unpopular, and unlikely to replace Zelensky in an election. With the only real candidate of succeeding Zelensky being Zaluzhny. Zaluzhny will end up proving more difficult to negotiate with than Zelensky. The US witnessed Zaluzhny's stubbornness during Ukraine's '2023 Counteroffensive', when Zaluzhny blasted NATO's tactics as 'obsolete' after multiple failed attacks. Instead launched his own tactics, and saw mild success.All three opposition figures have rejected calls for an early election in Ukraine.

Dubinsky, while working for '1+1 Channel', offered a very positive coverage of Zelensky in the lead-up to the 2019 elections. The two have since fallen out over Dubinsky's strong opposition towards the Ukrainian far-right and over Dubinsky's ties to Ihor Kolomoyskyi.Note, Kolomoyskyi, a former Ukrainian-Israeli oligarch, was stripped of his Ukrainian citizenship by Zelensky. Kolomoyskyi had long been accused corruption and of forming and financing anti-Maidan units in 2014, such as the 'Dnepr Gangs', which clashed with Azov on several occasions. Several Azov-linked politicians (such as Interior Minister Avakov) led for the nationalization of Kolomoyskyi's PrivatBank. Kolomoyskyi took the Poroshenko government to court in return. Kolomoyskyi was a large donor to 1+1 Channel, which Dubinsky worked for.

Title: â†©ï¸ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ - Kurakhovo direction update: Russian forces have b...

A source from the Russian 68th Tank Brigade tells Rerum Novarum that they are still waiting along the outskirts of Dachnoe, as small Ukrainian pockets remain in the trenches and tree-lines west of the town.Front-line sources, from Ukraine and Russia, state that the trapped Ukrainian personnel in the Kurakhovo pocket, west of Dachnoe, might be the infamous and very well experienced Ukrainian 79th Brigade 'Cyborgs'. This report remains unconfirmed at the moment.Reports of Russian forces capturing the entirety of Ulakly are pure fiction. A source from the Russian 38th Brigade, the very unit that's fighting there, tells Rerum Novarum that they just managed to position themselves in the southern outskirts of the town.Russian forces stormed Konstantinopol from the south early morning, creating a landing platform in the southeast of the town. Russian forces have also successfully crossed the Volcha river and are pressuring the Ukrainian force in the town from the north too.In Andreevka, battles continue in the west of the town. 80% of the large town is under Russian control, but sources tell Rerum Novarum that advancing here has become difficult as Ukrainian forces have destroyed most infrastructure, including the houses. Russian units are instead focusing on the large trench network north of the town.
